library.description: Use this plugin to unobtrusively add a datetimepicker, datepicker or timepicker dropdown to your forms
library.name: DateTimePicker

library.description: Pikaday is a JavaScript datepicker with a light footprint and easy style-ability with modular CSS.
library.name: Pikaday

library.description: Tempus is designed to be a full replacement to the Date class inside Javascript, to solve the frustration of missing features and broken functionality. Tempus offers over 230 methods ranging from string methods to date maths and assertions to iterators, all packed into a tiny 4.5kb (minified and gzipped) package.
library.name: Tempus
